short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your writing with proofreading, summarization, autocompletion, rephrasing, AI chat assistance, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grazie is an AI-powered writing companion for tech professionals. It is brought to you by JetBrains, the company behind IntelliJ IDEA, Kotlin, and many other developer tools.

With Grazie, you can:

💫 Benefit from instant proofreading.
🏁 Boost productivity and spark new ideas with context-aware AI chat.
💡 Extract ideas from text with the Summarize feature.
⚡ Generate and autocomplete content in a flash.
✅ Capture the perfect tone and style with every word.
🌎 Collaborate in English and German, with more languages to come.

➤ How to get started

1. Install the Grazie extension in Chrome.
2. Sign in with your JetBrains Account or create one at https://account.jetbrains.com. You can also use your Google Account or Apple ID.
3. Pin the extension to the toolbar so you can quickly tune its settings and access Grazie’s AI chat.
4. Go to your favorite website, choose some content to adjust, and see what Grazie can do. Or just start typing and see what Grazie suggests.

➤ FAQs

— How many languages ​​does Grazie support?

Grazie supports various languages across different features:
    ● Instant proofreading is available for English, German, Russian, and Ukrainian.
    ● Translation is supported for English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, Korean, Chinese, and Japanese.
    ● Features such as Summarize, Translate, Improve, Change tone, and Paraphrase are available for a range of languages but currently work best for English.


– Which LLMs are under the hood?

Grazie uses JetBrains’ proprietary models and LLMs by third-party providers such as OpenAI and Google. We continuously test new models and are considering adding more providers in the future, provided they meet our security standards. The full list of LLM providers we work with can be found here. We also develop our own LLMs and plan to combine third-party ones with ours, including open-source models. 

JetBrains’ proprietary models are used for:
    ● Instant proofreading
    ● Inline text completion
    ● Synonymization
    ● Definitions

OpenAI’s models work for:
    ● Grazie chat
    ● Summarization
    ● Translation
    ● Improving
    ● Tone correction
    ● Paraphrasing
    ● Continue writing


– How does Grazie differ from other writing tools?

    ● Integrated into your environment
Grazie is seamlessly integrated into your JetBrains IDEs and browsers. No matter where you're composing a code comment, crafting a commit message or pull request, or writing a task description or technical blog post, Grazie accompanies you and helps you put a more professional touch on your work. There is no need to switch between applications or interrupt your workflow.

    ● Multilingual
Grazie natively supports English and German, with more languages on the way. Enjoy better collaboration and content creation for global teams.

    ● Private and secure
Your text is not used to train models, and we don't retain any of your data in our servers' memory or logs, ensuring your information stays private and secure.

    ● Tech-context-aware
Grazie combines a rule-based approach and machine learning models that are specifically trained on high-tech industry content, ensuring a deep understanding of context and offering accurate suggestions when working on tech and scientific materials.

– How safe is Grazie?

Grazie, like all other JetBrains products, adheres to strict measures to protect the privacy and security of user data:
    ● We don’t use any text you type to train models, either our own or those of third parties.
    ● None of your text is retained in the memory or logs of our servers.
    ● Content generation features are currently powered by third-party LLM providers, but in the future, we plan to support local and on-premises models.

For more information, please refer to the Grazie Terms of Service (https://www.jetbrains.com/legal/docs/terms/grazie/) and the JetBrains Privacy Policy (https://www.jetbrains.com/legal/docs/privacy/privacy/).

— Is Grazie available in my region? 

Access to Grazie is restricted to the territories where our AI service providers are active. Please check the full list of territories here: https://www.jetbrains.com/legal/docs/terms/jetbrains-ai/service-territory/

— I have more questions. How do I contact you?

You can email us at grazie@jetbrains.com or reach us on our X (formerly Twitter) page: https://x.com/grazie.
